hero.title: The Re-invented Laser Game
hero.subheading: An immersive experience in the great outdoors
hero.description: Discover a new way to play laser tag in an exceptional natural setting. Ideal for corporate events, parties, and group outings.

0.title: Latest generation equipment
0.description: Discover the laser tag like never before with our latest generation equipment and immersive arenas.

1.title: Team Building
1.description: Perfect for corporate events, birthdays, or a fun day out with friends and family.

2.title: Multiple game modes
2.description: Choose from a variety of exciting game modes to keep the adrenaline going all day long.

0.name: Team Match
0.description: Each team faces the other to score the most points. The team with the most points wins the match.

1.name: Capture the flag
1.description: Infiltrate the enemy base, take their flag and bring it back to your base to score.

2.name: Last survivor
2.description: Each player for himself. Be the last with remaining lives to win.

3.name: Domination
3.description: Control strategic points on the map to accumulate points. Team coordination is the key to victory.

corporate_events.title: Corporate Events
corporate_events.description: Gather your team for an unforgettable corporate event at Wild Arena. Our laser tag arenas offer the perfect setting for team building, fostering communication, strategy, and camaraderie.
corporate_events.list_2: Latest generation equipment and immersive arenas

newsletter.title: Stay informed
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news, special offers and exclusive invitations to Wild Arena events.
